name: ButorWiki/CMS
short_description: A pure Java wiki/CMS engine. WAR file. File system based doc repository. Realtime indexed content of wiki, text, html, pdf, doc, xls, ppt, pps. WYSIWYG and text editor. Integrated filemanager. Stats. History. Lock/publish content. ACL. Watch and Alert.
